text: The Morghasts are Nagash's officers and heralds on the battlefield, carrying out his will and reinforcing the undead host. \\nMorghasts have an encouraging effect on their allies' [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership should the [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord be absent.
Unit damages all enemies around itself.
These possessed beings seem to be both lacking a material form, yet the blade still bites...
Nagash may be reborn, but he is merely a shadow of himself in his weakened form as he recoups his true power.
